channel.title: Morning Briefing · Finance
channel.description: Daily AU commercial property briefing — assets, funds, deals, development.

item.title: Mortgage Switch Surge: 1084 Loans Daily
item.description: Australians are ditching their mortgage lenders in droves, with a staggering 1084 loans switching hands each day. Experts estimate that borrowers could pocket up to $12,000 by making the move. Time to rethink your mortgage strategy?
item.content:encoded: Australians are ditching their mortgage lenders in droves, with a staggering 1084 loans switching hands each day. Experts estimate that borrowers could pocket up to $12,000 by making the move. Time to rethink your mortgage strategy?
